Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2013 05:04PM Mag8yearsurvivor wrote: I was just diagnosed with a new DM to my liver. I had radiation on spine in September. Bones are stable. Has anyone had one tumor on the liver removed in lieu of taxol? or in addition, to? Thank you. Mary Ann
Posts.Title: Starting FEC for liver mets. Moiralf Moiralf

Posts.Content: Aug 23, 2013 10:49AM Mag8yearsurvivor wrote: Hello Ladies, I do not know if it is appropriate to jump onto someone else's question, but mine is similar.  My recurrence (after 8 years) happened in February.  I started Exemestane in March but my doctor is already talking about switching me to an injection.  Is this common?  I was having favorable results and feeling great, but my arms, hands, feet and legs are numbing and he is testing again. Anyone have similar experiences? Thank you! Mary Ann
